In Case Study 1, we will explore the ethics and quantification.

## Learning Objectives

The goal of this lab is to introduce you to or remind you of the historical case that contributed to the development of the Institutional Review Board. This case is the Tuskegee Study of Untreated Syphilis in the Negro Male. Case files can be found below and in [week 1](weeks/week01.qmd).

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Learning Activities

By the end of this case study you will be able to:

1.  Identify historical issues of ethics and quantification
2.  Discuss the Institutional Review Board (IRB) and its purposes
